data.name: King's Bounty: Legions | Beast Master Pack
data.detailed_description:
A balanced starter pack for King's Bounty players. Take command of a squad of powerful creatures from the Beasts faction with a nice discount!

The Beasts are powerful indeed. They are creatures who live in the vast expanses of the realm, indomitable and capable of crushing any opponent. Sea Devils are incredibly agile and full of initiative, Thorn Hunters and Royal Thorns provide excellent firepower, Brontaurs are renowned for their exceptionally durable hide, while Dragons can heal their allies and incinerate enemies with lightning bolts.

Purchase this pack and master the power of the Beasts.
You will receive 5 types of carefully selected creatures to form a battleworthy army, and, as a bonus - Royal Aura for 7 days.

Creatures included:
  • 3 Emerald Dragons;
  • 16 Sea Devils;
  • 10 Royal Thorns;
  • 20 Thorn Hunters;
  • 12 Brontaurs.

Royal Aura provides:
  • +100% gold;
  • +10% leadership;
  • x2 resources drop chance per each fight.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: none
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: none

  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
